original_text: You will have many cows, sheep and goats. You will have plenty of gold and silver. You will have many more things than you have now.
korean_text: 또 네 소와 양이 번성하며 네 은금이 증식되며 네 소유가 다 풍부하게 될 때에

sentences.korean_translation: 너는 많은 소를 갖게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will have plenty of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 풍부한 금을 갖게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will have many more things
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 훨씬 더 많은 것들을 갖게 될 것이다
